text:
Wolfgang J. Fuchs (16 September 1945 – 20 January 2020) was a German historian and comic book translator. He was born in Unsleben, Germany. He was known as the main editor of "Die tollsten Geschichten von Donald Duck – Sonderheft", a German Disney comic. He was also known for his comic "Disneys Heimliche Helden" (2005–2009).
Fuchs died on 20 January 2020 in Munich at the age of 74.

annotations.surface_form: Die tollsten Geschichten von Donald Duck – Sonderheft
